 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמֵן‎</span>] **verb** ==grow fat== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***id.***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁמֶן‎</span> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be fat***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> especially derived species and derivatives; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֵין‎</span> adjective ***fat:*** Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šammu, fat;***</u></abbr> Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמן‎</span> ***oil***, so Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמנא‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>378</sup>; on relation of meanings [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>147</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַ֫נְתָּ‎</span> [[Deut.32.15|Deut 32:15]] and ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִשְׁמַן‎</span> v[[Deut.32.15|Deut 32:15]] both of Israel (prosperous and arrogant) under figure of ***fat*** beast; so ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁמְנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.28|Jer 5:28]] (of wicked). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַשְׁמִינוּ‎</span> [[Neh.9.25|Neh 9:25]] were sated ***and shewed fatness*** (inner causative); Imperative masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁמֵן‎</span> [[Isa.6.10|Isa 6:10]] ***make fat*** (dull, unreceptive), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב הָיָם הַוֶּה‎</span>.
